computer_jokes.q: Did you hear about the monkeys who shared an Amazon account?
Don't use 'beef stew' as a computer password.
What is the biggest lie in the entire universe?
computer_jokes.a: I have read and agree to the Terms & Conditions.

computer_jokes.q: What should you do after your Nintendo game ends in a tie?
How does a computer get drunk?
Why did the PowerPoint Presentation cross the road?
computer_jokes.a: To get to the other slide.

computer_jokes.q: Have you heard of that new band '1023 Megabytes'?
computer_jokes.a: They're pretty good, but they don't have a gig just yet.

computer_jokes.q: I just got fired from my job at the keyboard factory.
computer_jokes.a: They told me I wasn't putting in enough shifts.

computer_jokes.q: Why did the computer show up at work late?
